level.heading: Security interest unperfected before applicability date.
level.text: A security interest that is an unperfected security interest immediately before the applicability date becomes a perfected security interest:
Without further action, on the applicability date, if the applicable requirements for perfection under Article 9 as amended by the 2012 Act are satisfied before or at that time; or
When the applicable requirements for perfection are satisfied if the requirements are satisfied after that time.

level.heading: Editor’s Notes
level.text: Applicability of D.C. Law 19-669: Section 4 of D.C. Law 19-669 provided that the act shall apply as of July 1, 2013.
